name: lynda_typescript_chp1
description: TypeScript lets you write JavaScript "the way you really want to." TypeScript compiles to plain JavaScript, so it works in any browser, any host, and any OS. It adds a variety of helpful syntax and tools onto an already mature language, bringing the power and productivity of static typing and object-oriented development to core JavaScript. Plus, it's completely open source.
author: Wendy Wen
